metadata.purpose: Help users find practical solutions to problems they may encounter when completing tasks on the platform.
metadata.usage: A template for documenting known issues and their solutions within the VTEX platform.

title.voice: Use first-person voice from the user's perspective.
title.format: Avoid questions. Limit to 60 characters. Focus on what the user cannot do.

do: My store is not accepting credit card purchases.
I can’t create a production workspace
dont: Why isn't my credit card payment working?
Error while creating a production workspace

introduction.content: Describe the scenario and affected module/functionality in 1–2 concise paragraphs.

do: When attempting to complete a purchase in the checkout module, users encounter the 'Payment not processed' error.
dont: Various issues have been reported by users attempting to place an order.

tags.rule: List up to 3 relevant product names as tags, using consistent terminology.

dont: Catalog module and Store Framework technology.

keywords.rule: Use simple, searchable keywords separated by commas. Avoid long phrases or module descriptions.

dont: Catalog module, SKU code, integration with other systems

structure: Use steps (numbered or subsections) when needed.
Link to existing tutorials if the solution is complex.
Indicate who is responsible for each step (VTEX or user).
solution.clarity: Avoid ambiguity, duplication, or overly generic descriptions. Reuse existing docs when possible.

do: Make sure the email is correct and the password meets the required format...
dont: Login problems often occur and may be difficult to identify...

assets.rule: Include relevant screenshots and examples whenever possible to support understanding.

template_variation.rule: For grouped errors, use list format with error messages, meanings, and required actions.
